summary: This code installs Taskwarrior and Espeak, copies a configuration file, creates a gitignore file with 'latest' as the only item, and may set volume for Termux music at 15 (though commented out).

details.comment: This code installs Taskwarrior and Espeak, copies a configuration file, creates a gitignore file with 'latest' as the only item, and may set volume for Termux music at 15 (though commented out).
details.content:
apt install -y taskwarrior espeak
cp .taskrc ~/.taskrc
touch .gitignore
echo .latest >  .gitignore
#echo .latest >  .gitignore
#termux-volume music 15
